entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Saturday 18 March 2023
